title: Staying On The Potter's Wheel | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Staying On The Potter's Wheel | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to see promotion in your life, sometimes you'll have to go through a time of testing first. The way to pass the test is to keep a good attitude and stay in faith. What God promised is still on the way.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
